product_name: Shimano M088 Mountain Bike Shoes - Men's
long_description: Climbing over logs or hopping curbs, the Shimano M088 MTB bike shoe are stable, rigid and lightweight, details that mountain bike riders, commuters and even touring cyclists alike will appreciate. Lightweight, glass fiber reinforced polyamide soles deliver maximum power transfer; high traction lug soles provide excellent grip. Ratcheting microadjustable buckle straps allow subtle fit adjustments; offset rip-and-stick straps snug the fit without pressure points. Shoes feature reinforced synthetic uppers for durability and nylon mesh for breathability. Anatomically curved last provides a precise fit and improves foot stability. EVA footbeds cushion for walking comfort. Shoes feature a wider cleat adjustment range than previous Shimano shoes. Shimano M088 MTB bike shoes do not come with cleats.
